full_summary:
# Announcement of Bid Cancellation

### Request for Proposal: Cancelled
The Public Works and Government Services Canada has announced the cancellation of bid *W1568-220200/A* on 2023-02-06. The current status of the bid is `Cancelled` as indicated by the government.

### Bid Details

*   Bid Title: Cancelled
*   Solicitation Number: W1568-220200/A
*   Reference Number: PW-STN-201-5592
*   Amendment Number: 0
*   Publication Date: 2022-12-08
*   Tender Closing Date: 2023-01-13 14:00:00 (Deadline has passed)
*   Amendment Date: 2023-02-06
*   Cancelled Date: 2023-02-06

### Contracting Entity and End User Entity
The contracting entity is Public Works and Government Services Canada, situated at **11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada**.
The end user entity is the Department of National Defence located at **101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada**.

### Important Contact Details
You can reach out to Rina Marsland, the Contracting Authority, via email at **rina.marsland@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca**, phone at *306-241-5742 (    )*, or fax at *418-566-6167*.

### Trade Agreements
The bid is associated with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Region of Delivery
The bid delivery region is the Northwest Territories.

### Note on Attachment and URL
There are no available attachments or URLs for the bid.

Please note that the cancellation of bid *W1568-220200/A* has been announced publicly and a new bid solicitation may be issued in the future. Contractors are advised to monitor government websites and updates to confirm new bid opportunities.
